channel.title: Sponsered servers?
channel.description: Whats with that? is this way for MiTB to start adding cash to the wedding fund?

item.title: Sponsered servers?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Cheese_Police, post:4, topic:265734”]this is obv just to make money on his part.

he knows that nothing good will ever come from these kids, perfect plan tbh[/quote]

The point is that a monetary reward will spur innovation. The money is staying in my paypal account and I am not touching it. So it’s not a way to make money on my part.

Read full topic

item.title: Sponsered servers?

item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Cheese_Police, post:4, topic:265734”]this is obv just to make money on his part.

he knows that nothing good will ever come from these kids, perfect plan tbh[/quote]
Feel free to write a server and submit it - we’re taking software from anyone, not just users of moparscape.

item.title: Sponsered servers?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:2, topic:265734”]http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,345710.0.html

The money is going towards developing a server.[/quote]

Not just a server, but anything related to private servers as a whole. This could range from tools, to clients, to servers, to resources, to anything anyone thinks up.
